apiKey: put your Google Translate API key here (type: String)
charLimit: maximum number of characters per request. Defaults to the API limit for free accounts (10000); slow connections should use lower limits, e.g. 5000. (type: Number)
verbose: false suppresses verbose progress messages. Defaults to true (type: Boolean)

analysis.source: path/to/text/to/be/analyzed This is probably the same as completedDestination (type: String)
